Headline: Westbound #21 Cermak Temporary Reroute near Cermak/Hyone.
ShortDescription: Westbound 21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Western, Blue Island, Damen, and Cermak due to, street blockage near Cermak/Hyone.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Western, Blue Island, Damen, and Cermak due to, street blockage near Cermak/Hyone. 

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Service Delayed near Roosevelt
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing near Roosevelt due to a door problem on the train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing near Roosevelt due to a door problem on the train.

 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
